DOTA_HUD_RoshanAttackRadiant_Toast: The Dire collected enough taffy! Roshan has been unleashed to attack The Radiant!
DOTA_HUD_RoshanAttackDire_Toast: The Radiant collected enough taffy! Roshan has been unleashed to attack The Dire!
DOTA_HUD_SpookyTPUsed_Toast: {s:player_name} is invading the enemy team through a portal!
DOTA_HUD_PortalUnlocked_Toast: {s:player_name} unlocked a portal for their team!
DOTA_HUD_PortalUnlockedGood_Toast: The Radiant unlocked a portal for their team!
DOTA_HUD_PortalUnlockedBad_Toast: The Dire unlocked a portal for their team!
DOTA_HUD_RuneSpawned_Toast: {s:player_name} spawned a rune for their team!
DOTA_HUD_RoshanAttackedCandyWell_Radiant: Roshan is destroying Radiant's Taffy Well!
DOTA_HUD_RoshanAttackedCandyWell_Dire_To: Roshan is destroying Dire's Taffy Well!

Roshan is destroying Radiant's Bottom Taffy Well!
DOTA_HUD_RoshanAttackedCandyWell_DireTop: Roshan is destroying Dire's Top Taffy Well!
DOTA_HUD_RoshanAttackedCandyWell_DireMid: Roshan is destroying Dire's Mid Taffy Well!
DOTA_HUD_RoshanAttackedCandyWell_DireBot: Roshan is destroying Dire's Bottom Taffy Well!
DOTA_HUD_CandyBucketVulnerableGood_Toast: The Radiant's Home Bucket is now vulnerable!
DOTA_HUD_CandyWellTier2TopVulnerableGood: The Radiant's Top Taffy Well is now vulnerable!
DOTA_HUD_CandyWellTier2BotVulnerableGood: The Radiant's Bottom Taffy Well is now vulnerable!
DOTA_HUD_CandyBucketVulnerableBad_Toast: The Dire's Home Bucket is now vulnerable!
DOTA_HUD_CandyWellTier2TopVulnerableBad_: The Dire's Top Taffy Well is now vulnerable!
DOTA_HUD_CandyWellTier2BotVulnerableBad_: The Dire's Bottom Taffy Well is now vulnerable!
DOTA_HUD_RoshanCursedGoodTeam_Toast: Radiant cursed for not feeding Roshan!
DOTA_HUD_RoshanCursedBadTeam_Toast: Dire cursed for not feeding Roshan!
DOTA_HUD_GolemKill_Radiant: The Golem was destroyed by the Radiant!
DOTA_HUD_GolemKill_Dire: The Golem was destroyed by the Dire!
DOTA_HUD_RoshanTimer_ReturnHome_Descript: Roshan is returning to his cave.
DOTA_HUD_RoshanTimer_Sleeping_Descriptio: Roshan is sleeping. The Greevils will be out soon.
DOTA_HUD_RoshanTimer_Greevils_Descriptio: Greevils have stolen Roshan's candy. Steal it back by damaging them.
DOTA_HUD_RoshanTimer_RoshanKillGreevils_: Roshan has awoken and is getting his candy back from the Greevils.
DOTA_HUD_RoshanTimer_Roshan_Description: Roshan is coming for his candy.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_00: Damaging Greevils will cause Greevil Taffy to fly out of them. Walk over it to pick it up.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_01: Right click an ENEMY Taffy Well while holding Taffy to score it.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_02: Taffy must be channeled one at a time into an enemy Taffy Well and can be interrupted.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_03: Taffy channeling starts out slow but gets quicker over time!
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_04: Taffy Wells are invulnerable and can only be destroyed by Roshan.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_05: Once Roshan tires of chasing the Greevils he will walk to and destroy the Taffy Well with the most taffy inside of it.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_06: The game ends when Roshan destroys a team's fourth and final Taffy Well.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_07: The Greevil Clock at the top of the HUD will tell you how much time you have left in each round.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_08: The HUD also displays which Taffy Well is currently being threatened by Roshan.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_09: You can persuade Roshan to change targets by scoring more Taffy into a different well.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_10: You must exceed the Taffy score in a well to change Roshan's mind. A tie score is not enough!
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_11: Each Taffy Well has a Taffy Guardian that protects it.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_12: Taffy Guardians periodically cast a fearing projectile against heroes.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_13: Taffy Guardians prioritize heroes over other units.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_14: When Roshan destroys a Taffy Well its Taffy Guardian will also be destroyed.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_15: Taffy Guardians can be killed but will be refreshed after Roshan destroys a Taffy Well.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_16: Greevils are full of tricks or treats based on their color! Killing them will release the filling.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_17: When Roshan eats a Greevil he will spit out its filling in front of him.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_18: Red Greevils are full of spiders.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_19: Orange Greevils are full of explosive lava.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_20: Yellow Greevils are full of gold bags.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_21: Green Greevils are full of health cupcakes.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_22: Blue Greevils are full of mana cupcakes.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_23: Purple Greevils are full of extra Greevil Taffy.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_24: White Greevils are full of Tomes of Knowledge.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_25: Black Greevils are full of neutral items.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_26: You can choose one of four mounts at the start of each game.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_27: Each mount has different strengths and weaknesses that can complement your hero choice and help you navigate the map.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_28: The penguin mount is very fast but any hero damage will dismount you.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_29: The snowball, ogre seal, and frosted toad mounts all require a harder disable to dismount the rider.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_30: The snowball mount is slow but will stun heroes when you summon it and smash into them.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_31: The ogre seal mount is fast, damages enemies as it hops, and can hop down cliffs, but it can barely turn.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_32: The frosted toad mount travels at an average speed but it can hop up and down cliffs.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_33: You can't summon your mount within 3s of taking damage from heroes or Roshan.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_34: A Rune will spawn in Roshanâ€™s pit every minute.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_35: Wards are available in the shop.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_36: Aghanim's Shard is available at 7 minutes into the game.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_37: TP Scrolls cannot be purchased and consume no charges when used.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_38: Bags of Greevil Taffy are worth 5 Taffy.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_40: Roshan knocks back and damages any unit in his path.
DOTA_winter_2022_gameplay_tip_41: Neutral items drop at an accelerated schedule from neutral creeps.
DOTA_HUD_Diretide_RoshanTarget_Ally:
Roshan is coming after
YOUR TEAMMATE
DOTA_HUD_Diretide_RoshanTarget_Enemy: Roshan is coming after an enemy
DOTA_HUD_Diretide_CandyBucketAttacked: Your Taffy Bucket is under attack
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_building_defender_a: Provides %bonus_armor% armor, %bonus_magic_resist%% magic resistance, +%bonus_hp_regen% HP/s health regeneration, and %bonus_status_resist%% status resistance to nearby allies.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_building_defender_: Providing bonus armor, magic resistance, health regen, and status resistance to nearby allies.
Receiving bonus armor, magic resistance, health regen, and status resistance from a Diretide building.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bucket_soldier_atta: Slows attack speed and movement speed.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_diretide_bucket_sol: Fires a projectile that fears units in along its path.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bucket_soldier_att: This unit's attack speed and movement speed are slowed.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_diretide_bucket_sol: Taffy Guardian strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with its attack.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_tome_winter202: That which raises beast to man and man to god.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_mana_potion_De: Restores a large amount of mana.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_health_potion_: Restores a large amount of health.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_candy_Descript: Throw it in the ENEMY Taffy Wells!
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_candy_bag_Desc: Throw it in the ENEMY Taffy Wells!
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_hero_candy_Descrip: Number of taffies this unit is carrying.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_candy_eat_regen_De: Regenerating health and mana from delicious taffy.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_candy_eaten_recent: Feeling full and unable to eat taffy for a bit.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_candy_scoring_bloc: Unable to score Taffy because you've been recently hurt.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_candy_shield_D:
Use: Sugar Rush

Give nearby allies a shield that allows scoring Taffy even when recently hurt.

Duration: %duration%
Radius: %radius%
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_candy_shield_Descr: Damage does not disable scoring Taffy. Removed once a certain amount of damage is taken.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_hero_candy_buc:
Use: Throw

Target enemy buildings to transfer taffy to them, baiting Roshan to destroy them.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Keeps delicious taffy! Do not put apples in here!
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_hero_candy_bucket_D:
Use: Throw

Right click enemy buildings to transfer taffy to them, tempting Roshan to destroy them.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_hero_candy_bucket_L: Keeps delicious taffy! Do not put apples in here!
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_building_candy_buc: Greevil Taffy has been stuffed into this building! Roshan will be coming coming to get it back...
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_hero_candy_bucket_: Carrying Greevil Taffy. Throw it into your enemy's taffy well!
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_passive_De: Damage will cause Greevil Taffy to drop.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_filling_De: Will drop a Trick or Treat when killed based on the color of the Greevil.
dota_hud_error_invulnerable_candy_bucket: You cannot score in this building yet.
dota_hud_error_cant_throw_to_non_buildin: Can Only Throw Taffy At Buildings
dota_hud_error_candy_scoring_blocked: Can't score Taffy when you've been recently hurt!
dota_hud_error_cant_cast_on_buildings_no: Can't find taffy bucket ability on building
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_diretide_roshan_cu: Receiving damage over time due to a teamwide failure to feed Roshan.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_diretide_respawn_t: Adding a +%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% seconds to your respawn timer from previous deaths this round.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_diretide_bucket_sol: Taffy Guardians within range heal %regen_pct_per_second%% of Max Health per second when out of combat. If a Guardiant takes damage, the regen is disabled for %peace_time% seconds.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_diretide_bucket_so: Regenerates a percentage of Max Health per second when out of combat. Disabled for a short duration if the Taffy Guardian takes damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_summon_penguin_Desc: Summon a friendly mount to ride around on. Activate again to dismount. Cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy Hero.
DOTA_HUD_mount_select_Description: Choose a companion to ride around on.

DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mount_penguin_Desc:

- Damage knocks you off.

- Can't turn
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mount_ogreseal_Des:

- Can't turn

DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mount_snowball_Des:

DOTA_HUD_Diretide_WellTargetedEnemy: Roshan comes for the enemy Well!
DOTA_HUD_Diretide_WellTargetedRadiant: Roshan comes for a Radiant Taffy Well!
DOTA_HUD_Diretide_WellTargetedDire: Roshan comes for a Dire Taffy Well!
DOTA_HUD_candy_well_Description: Throw taffy into your enemy's well.
DOTA_HUD_candy_well_targeted_Description: This well has the most taffy. Roshan will destroy it when he is finished feasting on greevils.
DOTA_HUD_candy_well_invulnerable_Descrip: Taffy cannot be thrown into this well. Destroy an adjacent well to remove this protection.
DOTA_HUD_candy_well_destroyed_Descriptio: Roshan has destroyed this well and taken his taffy back.
DOTA_HUD_phase_GameStateSleep_Descriptio:
Gather taffy and score it in your enemy's taffy wells.

Roshan will destroy the well with the most taffy when he awakens.
DOTA_HUD_phase_GameStateKillGreevils_Des:
Roshan is feasting on the Greevils outside his pit.
Once he's full he will smash the well with the most taffy.
DOTA_HUD_phase_GameStateScore_Descriptio: Roshan is coming to destroy the well with the most taffy.
